snippet: Fortunato and Adelaida Dilan immigrated to the United States in search of new opportunities. But illness and financial hardship have made that search into a struggle.
abstract: Jewish Assn Serving the Aging helps Filipino immigrants Fortunato and Adelaida Dilan of Brooklyn with financial assistance and meals; association, beneficiary of UJA-Federation of New York is one of seven organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund.
lead_paragraph: Fortunato and Adelaida Dilan immigrated to the United States in search of new opportunities. But illness and financial hardship have made that search into a struggle.

headline.print_headline: Turning to Others for Help When Pride Won’t Pay Bills
headline.main: Philippine Grandparents, Struggling to Start Fresh in a New Homeland

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
